## [Building a project website](https://github.com/Johannayala-vargas/Johannayala-vargas.github.io)

- In this first lab Lab01, we created a website using Github Pages, where all of our work will be on display.
-In this project, we learned some handy uses for R Markdown, Viewer, and the ‘knit’ function to see our code come to life on a webpage.
-Learn how to put together our own website.
